Factsheet

Developer:
Le Slo
Based in Madrid
Release date:
Platforms:
Steam
Itch
Website:
www.alephantgame.com
Regular Price:
USD 9.99

Description

A silent puzzle game about language.

History

With a never ending obsession about languages and details, the inspiration of this game lies in learning that the first letter of the Hebrew alphabet is silent.

Features

  • Puzzles
  • Letters
  • Animals
